name: Orb Wars (itch)
description:
Orb Wars is a bullet hell arcade shooter. Push and pull your orbs to fight through hordes of enemies.

The game can be played in the browser and is available as a free download.

How To Play

  • WASD - Move
  • LEFT CLICK - Push Orb
  • RIGHT CLICK - Pull Orbs
  • SPACE - Blink
  • Q - Boost
  • N - Next Level / Leave Shop
  • ESCAPE, TAB, P - Menu

Credits

Design & Programming - Catal

  • Font: "Bebas Neue" by Ryoichi Tsunekawa
  • Soundeffect: Juhani Junkala
  • Music: Yoshi
